sentences: Enric Roig Masriera (Barcelona, 1892 - ibid, December 17 of 1962) was a violinist , poet and  musicologist .
He was one of the Masrieras, a renowned family of artists of modernism  (Lluís Masriera i Rosés, Josep Masriera i Manovens, Francesc Masriera i Manovens) present in various fields of culture.

Música   a pioneering movement in Spain which was active between March 1935 and February 1936, ten years after the birth of the electric recordings, with a clear educational vision of the citizens of his country.

These sessions also involved the eminent musicologist Father Higini EAnglès i Pàmies the reviewer Josep Palau i Claveras, the folklorist and Mallorquin composer Baltasar Samper i Marquès and the music critic from Madrid Adolfo Salazar.
